I think I have just the right film for you! Have you considered "Downfall" (2004)? It's a powerful drama that explores the complexities of language and communication, set against the backdrop of World War II Germany. The all-star cast, including Juliane Köhler and Bruno Ganz, brings depth and nuance to this gripping story.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more fantastical, I'd recommend "Psychic Experiment" (N/A). This eerie tale delves into the realm of the unknown, where reality is tested and the boundaries of human understanding are pushed. The cast, led by Adrienne King and Glenn Morshower, delivers memorable performances in this thought-provoking thriller.

Let me know if either of these catches your eye!
